prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon that can withstand extreme temperatures and has a fierce expression.

Generate an image of a Pokemon with interesting facial features and an imposing stature.
Make a fiery creature that embodies strength and resilience, perfect for battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments but can adapt to various terrains.
Design a Pokemon that is both fierce and playful, with striking color combinations.
